name: Purpose
text: §431:16-102    The purpose of this part is to provide a mechanism for the payment of covered claims under certain insurance policies to avoid excessive delay in payment and, to the extent provided in this part, to minimize financial loss to claimants or policyholders because of the insolvency of an insurer. [L 1987, c 347, pt of §2; am L 2000, c 93, §1]
